name: Action War by Top Modern Sniper Hero Duty: Best Free Shooter Trigger Game For Fun
name_original: Action War by Top Modern Sniper Hero Duty: Best Free Shooter Trigger Game For Fun
description:
Your Alliance needs your help. Are you brave enough to step up to the challenge? The evil faction is taking over the world and needs to be stopped! Help these soldiers in the battlefield in this super action packed game!

YOUR OBJECTIVES:
-Take down the incoming enemy soldiers!
-Dodge dangerous obstacles to survive!
-Collect coins to unlock new characters!

Grab this amazing game while it is still FREE!
